explains: v. （用机器大量）生产，制造；编造，捏造；生成，产生（一种物质）
n. 大量制造，批量生产；工业品；制造业
wordGroup: manufacture process 制造工艺；建造过程
steel manufacture 钢铁工业；炼钢业
manufacture procedure 制造过程；制程
supervise the manufacture of 监制
manufacture bases n. 施工依据
lean manufacture 精益生产；精实生产；精益制造

sentences.en: They manufacture the class of plastics known as thermoplastic materials.
sentences.cn: 他们生产被称为热塑材料的塑料类制品。

sentences.en: Coca-Cola, Pepsi and Cadbury use franchisers to manufacture, bottle and distribute their products within geographical areas.
sentences.cn: 可口可乐、百事可乐和吉百利公司利用特许经销商在一定的地区内生产、罐装和销售其产品。

sentences.en: Brookman & Langdon were said to manufacture the most desirable pens and these necessarily command astonishingly high prices.
sentences.cn: 据说布鲁克曼兰登公司制造的钢笔最令人满意，而这必然地导致高得惊人的价格。
